frontmatter.title: Overt positive experiences
frontmatter.description: Recognize frustration. Strive for better. Accept what is. Find the best in what is now. Overly communicate the positive. s

frontmatter.title: Approach disagreements with open mindedness
frontmatter.description: Running head first into opposition won't sway anyone

frontmatter.title: Work towards common goals thru influence
frontmatter.description: Seek to influence others by letting them see what you see, rather than dictating outcomes via ultimate control.
